message: Digital technology has made it easier than ever for sex offenders to contact potential child victims around the world, share images of their abuse and encourage each other to commit further crimes. 92 percent of all child sexual abuse URLs are hosted in five countries: the Netherlands, the United States, Canada, France and the Russian Federation.

data.description: Digital technology has made it easier than ever for sex offenders to contact potential child victims around the world, share images of their abuse and encourage each other to commit further crimes. Congress could help by passing the Stop Enabling Sex Traffickers Act (SESTA).
data.title: UNICEF USAVoice: Innocent Victims: The Fight Against Online Child Sex Trafficking
